00004 {

00008 double  Timer::usecElapsed()
00009 {
00010         gettimeofday(&end_time,NULL);
00011         time_diff = ((double)end_time.tv_sec*1e6   + (double)end_time.tv_usec) -  
00012                     ((double)start_time.tv_sec*1e6 + (double)start_time.tv_usec);
00013         return time_diff;
00014 }
00016 double Timer::msecElapsed()
00017 {
00018         return (usecElapsed()/1000.0f);
00019 }
00021 double Timer::secElapsed()
00022 {
00023         return (usecElapsed()/double(1e6));;
00024 }
00026 Timer::~Timer()
00027 {
00028 }
00030 void Timer::restart()
00031 {
00032         gettimeofday(&start_time,NULL);
00033 }
00035 void Timer::msecSynch(double period)
00036 {
00037         double time_elapsed = this->msecElapsed();
00038         if( time_elapsed < period*1e3)
00039                 usleep((int)(period*1e3 -time_elapsed)); 
00040 }
